entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING ENDED, Sanikiluaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:51 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanikiluaq Airport 02:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: -21.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -24.2°C
Wind: WNW 47 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Blizzard developing this evening. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 early this evening then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
